title: Dry-run mode for exchange integration
description: Test exchange integration without real money to verify functionality before live trading.

title: Real money trading risk mitigation: Parallel testing
description: Run real trading in parallel with paper trading for 30+ days to verify execution before full deployment.

title: Portfolio-level risk metrics (VaR, correlation limits)
description: Add portfolio-level risk metrics: VaR calculation, correlation limits (advanced feature).

title: Slippage protection
description: Reject trades with excessive slippage to protect against bad fills.

title: Order management system
description: Add limit orders, stop orders, and order cancellation capabilities for real exchange trading.

title: A/B testing framework
description: Test multiple configs simultaneously in paper trading to compare performance.

title: Config rollback mechanism
description: One-click revert to previous config for easy rollback if new config underperforms.

title: Balance verification
description: Check available balance before each trade to ensure sufficient funds exist.

title: Exchange API integration
description: Add Binance/Coinbase API for actual trading. Real order placement and management.

title: Cross-asset correlation UI indicator
description: Display correlation indicator on overview dashboard to show ETH-BTC correlation over time.
close_reason: Completed: Added ETH-BTC correlation indicator to overview dashboard with API endpoint and React component

title: Multi-source price verification
description: Compare prices across sources (Binance, CoinGecko, Coinbase) before trading to ensure price accuracy.

title: Backup and recovery procedures
description: Document disaster recovery plan for trading system data and configuration.

title: Configure Discord webhook
description: Set DISCORD_WEBHOOK_URL environment variable. Code is ready, user action needed.

title: Refactor optimization scripts for reusability
description: Some optimization scripts could be refactored for reusability to reduce code duplication.

title: Real money trading risk mitigation: Maximum position limits
description: Enforce max 10% of capital per trade initially for real money trading.

title: Real money trading risk mitigation: Start with small positions
description: Start with very small position sizes (1-5% of intended capital) after Phase 2 completion and gradually increase as confidence grows.

title: Trade analysis by time of day and signal strength
description: Analyze win rate by time of day, regime, and signal strength to identify patterns.

title: Stress testing framework
description: Test strategy under extreme conditions: 50% flash crash, exchange outage, extreme volatility periods. Document results.
notes: ✅ Tested and working. Script successfully runs stress tests for 4 scenarios. Note: Currently uses same candles for normal/stress (candle modification logic exists but needs integration with backfill-test to use custom candles).

title: Out-of-sample validation
description: Hold out 20% of data for final validation to ensure strategy generalizes to unseen market conditions.
notes: ✅ Tested and working. Script successfully splits periods into training/validation sets and calculates overfitting scores. Generates detailed reports.

title: Monte Carlo simulation
description: Test strategy robustness to parameter variations using Monte Carlo simulation.

title: Position limits at exchange level
description: Enforce maximum position sizes at exchange level for additional safety.

title: Partial fill handling
description: Handle cases where only part of order fills (real exchange only).

title: Rate limit monitoring
description: Track and alert on API usage to prevent rate limit issues.

title: Order timeout handling
description: Cancel orders that don't fill within 5 minutes (real exchange only).

title: Exchange error handling
description: Handle exchange-specific errors: insufficient funds, market closed, rate limits, etc.

title: Manual position management
description: Ability to manually close positions for paper trading operations.

title: Performance attribution by regime/strategy
description: Track returns by regime (bullish, bearish, neutral) and strategy to understand performance drivers.

title: Walk-forward optimization
description: Optimize strategy on rolling windows to prevent overfitting. Test out-of-sample performance and compare to current optimization approach.
notes: ✅ Tested and working. Script successfully runs walk-forward optimization with rolling windows. Generates reports in data/backfill-reports/.

title: API key rotation
description: Automatically rotate API keys every 90 days for enhanced security.

title: Phase 2: Real Exchange Integration
description: Complete real exchange integration for actual trading. Includes exchange API integration, order management, balance verification, error handling, slippage protection, dry-run mode, and position limits. Deferred from Phase 1 (Paper Trading Hardening).

title: Historical trade replay visualization
description: Visualize past trades on chart to help analyze trading performance and strategy effectiveness.
close_reason: Completed: Enhanced PriceChart with detailed trade markers, hover tooltips, and buy/sell indicators

title: Daily performance summary email
description: Automated daily email with key metrics (returns, drawdown, win rate, trade count).
